channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Common Licensing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Common Licensing

item.title: CVE-2024-41774|2024-08-13T11:03:30.402Z -- ibm -- common%20licensing
item.description: IBM Common Licensing 9.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows a privileged user to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 350348.

item.title: CVE-2024-40697|2024-08-13T10:59:51.302Z -- ibm -- common%20licensing
item.description: IBM Common Licensing 9.0 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 297895.

item.title: CVE-2023-50306|2024-06-04T17:17:54.898Z -- ibm -- common%20licensing
item.description: IBM Common Licensing 9.0 could allow a local user to enumerate usernames due to an observable response discrepancy. IBM X-Force ID: 273337.

item.title: CVE-2023-50306|2024-08-02T22:16:46.620Z -- ibm -- common%20licensing
item.description: IBM Common Licensing 9.0 could allow a local user to enumerate usernames due to an observable response discrepancy. IBM X-Force ID: 273337.
